
### Summary table

```{r echo=FALSE, results='asis', message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
Elections %>%
  group_by(Year, Kaso) %>%
  filter(LDP>0 & LDP <1) %>%
  mutate(EldPop = EldPop/100) %>%
    dplyr::summarize(Turnout = mean(Turnout, na.rm=TRUE),
                     LDP = mean(LDP, na.rm=TRUE),
                     `LDP-Gap` = mean(LDPDif, na.rm=TRUE),
                     FStrength = mean(Fstrength, na.rm=TRUE),
                     Elderly = mean(EldPop, na.rm=TRUE)) %>%
  gt(rowname_col = "Kaso") %>%
  fmt_number(
    columns = 2:7,
    decimals = 2 # decrease decimal places
    ) %>%
  tab_options(
    column_labels.border.top.color = "black",
    column_labels.border.bottom.color = "black",
    table_body.border.bottom.color = "black",
    table_body.hlines.color = "white"
    ) %>%
  tab_header(
    title = md("**Municipal characteristics**"),
    subtitle = md("*Aggregated by fiscal profiles*")
  ) %>%
    data_color(
    columns = 2:7,
    colors = my_pal
    )
```
